backend/main.mo: Actor managing user profiles, payments, game logic, transactions, and admin functions with access control and configuration state.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old actor state to new format by adding lastSpinResult to user profiles and preserving all other fields.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing frontend wheel, spin interaction, payout, and UI feature requirements with associated files and metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing short summaries of major frontend components, pages, and hooks for reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base setup defining theme variables for light and dark modes and applying global background and border styles.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML mounting point loading the React application via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main routing setup connecting pages, authentication, admin guards, themes, and app layout for the React frontend.
frontend/src/components/admin/PaymentSet: Handles Stripe setup, validating secret key and country list, and shows configuration or loading state.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminRouteG: Protects admin routes by checking admin status and redirecting unauthorized users.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal for completing initial profile with name, birth date, and optional referral, submitting via mutation.
frontend/src/components/common/PageHeade: Reusable header component displaying title, optional description, badge, and actions.
frontend/src/components/common/PremiumSp: Stylized animated spinner with size options for loading states.
frontend/src/components/game/OutcomeEffe: Displays visual effects based on game outcome with timed animations.
frontend/src/components/game/SpinWheel.t: Animates a spinning wheel to land on a backend-provided outcome using deterministic rotation.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main app layout with navigation, user profile info, admin links, and animated background.
frontend/src/components/wallet/BalanceTi: Smoothly animates balance changes in a credit display.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the current identity, refreshing dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth state, login/logout methods, and initializes AuthClient with custom options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for user profile, admin checks, leaderboard, credit data, transactions, and wheel-spin mutations using the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining a dark theme color system and various utility classes for animations and premium UI effects.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Admin dashboard offering navigation to user management, wheel config, withdrawals, and payment requests.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminManualPaym: Admin page to review manual payment requests, approve/decline them, and update QR/instructions config including image upload validation.
Displays leaderboard users and allows admins to edit and update user credit balances via a dialog.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminWheelConfi: Admin interface for viewing and updating the house edge percentage used in the wheel game.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminWithdrawal: Placeholder admin page showing planned functionality for processing user withdrawal requests.
frontend/src/pages/BuyCreditsPage.tsx: UI for purchasing credits, creating manual payment requests, showing package options, payment statuses, and QR dialog handling.
frontend/src/pages/GamePage.tsx: Implements the spin‑wheel game UI, manages spin logic and outcome effects, and displays balance-based results.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Renders a login screen using Internet Identity with branding and a sign‑in button that shows loading state.
frontend/src/pages/payments/PaymentFailu: Informs the user that no payment request was created and provides navigation to retry or return to the game.
frontend/src/pages/payments/PaymentSucce: Displays status of a submitted manual payment request and refresh tools, with UI varying based on request state.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Displays the user's profile details, balance, bonus status, and metadata with loading states and badges.
frontend/src/pages/TransactionsPage.tsx: Shows the user's full transaction history with icons, amounts, and loading placeholders.
frontend/src/pages/UnauthorizedPage.tsx: Presents an access‑denied message with a button to return to the home page.
frontend/src/pages/WalletPage.tsx: Provides balance display, buy/withdraw actions, and a list of recent transactions.
frontend/src/pages/WithdrawPage.tsx: Shows withdrawal info and notes that the withdrawal feature is still under development.
frontend/src/utils/assetUrl.ts: Builds correct asset URLs using Vite’s base path while ensuring clean slashes.
frontend/src/utils/creditPricing.ts: Utility functions for deriving credits-per-INR ratios from packages and computing credits for custom INR amounts.
frontend/src/utils/currency.ts: Simple helpers to format INR and convert between rupees and paise.
frontend/src/utils/generatedAssets.ts: Defines static paths for generated wheel and effect assets relative to the public directory.
frontend/src/utils/razorpay.ts: Empty placeholder file for Razorpay-related utilities.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash mode), store/retrieve them in sessionStorage, and persist values across navigation.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugins for the frontend build.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s current state and requirements for implementing a 4‑section spinning wheel game with specific rules, UI effects, and payouts.
